scripts.bundle: node --input-type=module -e "import fs from 'node:fs'; fs.mkdirSync('build',{recursive:true}); fs.mkdirSync('dist',{recursive:true});" && esbuild obs-agent.mjs --bundle --platform=node --format=cjs --target=node18 --outfile=build/obs-agent.cjs
scripts.build:win: npm run bundle && pkg build/obs-agent.cjs --targets node18-win-x64 --output dist/CLiP-BOOsT-Helper.exe
scripts.build:linux: npm run bundle && pkg build/obs-agent.cjs --targets node18-linux-x64 --output dist/CLiP-BOOsT-Helper-linux-x64
scripts.build:mac:x64: npm run bundle && pkg build/obs-agent.cjs --targets node18-macos-x64 --output dist/CLiP-BOOsT-Helper-mac-x64
scripts.build:mac:arm64: npm run bundle && pkg build/obs-agent.cjs --targets node18-macos-arm64 --output dist/CLiP-BOOsT-Helper-mac-arm64
scripts.build:mac: npm run build:mac:x64 && npm run build:mac:arm64
